Text: Thanks a ton. I was super excited that you didn't include the campfire headphase since i already have it.

Glad you enjoyed it. My Campfire Headphase version wasn't the BoC, so I left it out. Not one of my favourite albums anyways...

If you ever here of a legit copy of Hooper Bay or any older BoC coming out, let me know.
